description:
Stackless Python 101

Presented by Richard Tew

Abstract

An introduction to Stackless Python, showing what it is useful for and
how to use it.

Outline

The talk would start by describing what Stackless Python is, and the
reasons why you would use it. Next it would cover how to use Stackless
Python. And finally, what the limitations of a green threading framework
like this are and what needs to be done to cater for them.

[VIDEO HAS ISSUES: Sound and video are poor. Slides are hard to read.]
title: Richard Tew - Stackless Python 101
